name: Sure Snippets
description: A full fledge snipper generator built for the quick and efficient construction of VS Code snippets.

name: Interactive Periodic Table
description: An interactive periodic table built using vue. Comes with overview of each element, shell diagrams, element filtering, and much more.

name: Vue Sure Toast
description: Toast plugin built and designed for use with Vuejs. Vue Sure Toast is highly configurable and easy to use.
